content: **introduction** easy amigurumi pattern for chibi whale orca or any color you want to be this is pretty fun small project for any level and it s perfect as toys or keychain~ the final result is around 6x7 cm this pattern is available only for personal use do not duplicate copy or sell this pattern but you are free to sell or publish photos of your finished amigurumi product from this pattern as long as you give credits for this website properly **tools & materials** * crochet hook 2 5mm * 2 safety eyes diameter 5mm * cotton sock yarn color white & color for the main body of your choosing in my case i pick blue * stuffing materials **techniques** * magic_ring * single_crochet single_crochet * increase increase * invisible decrease / decrease decrease * slip_stitch slip_stitch **notes** when the indication is grouped like this single_crochet increase * 6 it means to do a single_crochet and increase repeat for 6 times if you like what i m doing you can support me here https //www buymeacoffee com/pawlarius
